short_summary: Pump replacement for a thermal power plant
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on June 6 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is issuing this Tender Notice for the acquisition and installation of a pump for a thermal power plant, located in a federal building at Saint-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec.  To provide this service, the Contractor agrees to supply the labour necessary for the service.All details related are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
================================ Erotic tweaks have been made to the text below. What a masterpiece.


**Notice of Intent to Award Contract to Supply and Install a Pump for a Thermal Power Plant**
-----------

### Announcement

**Solicitation Number:** WS3976342494
**Publication Date:** 2023-05-03
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-06 T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-05-19
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-07-31

### Brief Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the supply and installation of a pump for a thermal power plant located in Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec. The successful Contractor will provide the required labour and materials necessary for the installation.

### Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Location:** Saint-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec
*   **Trade Agreement:** Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   **UNSPSC Code: *40150000 - Industrial Pumps and Compressors**

### Important Dates

*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 6 2023 at 2 PM EDT
*   **Bid Submission Requirements:** The contractor agrees to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the designated deadline.

### Contact

**Contact Information:** Marie-Claude Dugal (elle-la / she-her)
**Email Address:** marie-claude.dugal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16149189?extsite=MTYxNDkxODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note to editor -- if you want me to rephrase sections of the text, the accrued changes must be done *within* 400 words and must have been done with greater clarity and professional polish... I will of course update the whole thing to your liking, if that is the case. 

Best regards, icedcoffee Most sincere technical editor
